title: Wellington Delivery
content:
1. Income & Certificates
2. Delivery (Check distinct sheep)
3. Foresight (Pick 2 tokens)
4. Bonus Action

title: Hand Limit
content: Hand limit is 4 cards (immediate discard if exceeded). Increases to 5/6 with Storehouses on sea board.

title: Tax / Hazards
content: Passing a Hazard requires paying coins equal to the number shown. If unable to pay, you cannot cross.

title: Building Construction
content: Pay 2 Craftsmen per building level (2/4/6/8). Place a private building tile on an empty building space.

title: Exchange Tokens
content: Can be used anytime during your turn (except during card draw resolution) to Draw 2, Discard 2.
